title: Banned?
body:
My cousin who is in on leave was playing on my account last night and said I received an in-game message in yellow text saying something to the effect of:  "Sorry but your account has been permanently banned...".  After he told me that I logged out and was able to log back into my account and even join a game.  I'm so confused as to what would have caused this?  Any help would be appreciated.

Summoner Name: LionzEye

replies.body:
Sooooo first off the obligatory: Account sharing is bad mmm'kay? You run the risk of someone abusing your account and possibly getting it banned, in which case we may not be able to help due to not being able to tell who the original creator is. Moving right along....

It sounds like your cousin probably got sent a message by someone abusing the chat emote system. It's not very well known, but with a certain command you can make your chat look like a system message. I went ahead and double-checked your account, and there aren't any bans at all so you're still good to go!
